Heart of Warding:
You are overcome by a voice, a voice so powerful you are helpless as it speaks:
A terrible creature fell to the earth from above in order to vent a mother's spite, cursed and forsaken by her own children. Dark Pilgrim of the Holy Land, Do you dare face the Land Dragon Antharas?
(A maximum of 200 people can challenge Antharas.)
Move to Antharas' Nest
